a latecomer here:

i agree that it's not a good idea to hide things behind the curtain from users. though, in many cases, it might be easier to to have a global behavior of ignoring, e.g., gpu (i.e., make .cuda() do nothing). could we at least give some kind of global switch allowing this behiavour?
